os.fullpath: Operating System :: Modern (Vendor-Supported) Desktop Operating Systems :: Linux

name: PuppEX Tahr Linux Live CD
short_description:
ABOUT
PuppEX Tahr is a remaster of Puppy Linux Tahr 6.0, released on October 28, 2014. PuppEX Tahr/Puppy Tahr is compatible with Ubuntu 14.04 binary packages.

KERNEL
Kernel 4.0.1-PAE-puppex is used.  

PACKAGES INSTALLED
PuppEX uses the original Puppy Tahr Desktop. I have added the file manager PCManFM and LXTerminal. They are more useful than ROX-Filer respectively RXVT, I think. 

RUNNING FAST
The ISO file is on the whole 475 MB, which is due to me including NVIDIA Graphics driver 346.59, Gimp, Google Chrome and compiling tools. PuppEX Tahr is despite this still running as fast as the original, which means it runs very, very fast compared to most other Linux systems. (Puppy/PuppEX runs from RAM).

MOST important CHANGES
I've changed kernel from 3.14.20 to 4.0.1-PAE-puppex and installed NVIDIA Graphics driver 346.59. The Nvidia driver will be used if your computer/card is "modern" enough.

Default LANGUAGE
The default language (locale) is set to English.
summary: PuppEX Tahr is a remaster of Puppy Linux Tahr 6.0
